short.zh_CN: 根据您的关键字，以 Excel/CSV/JSON/HTML/XML 文件形式，从搜索引擎中一键抓取 Instagram 特定个人资料中的电子邮件。

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
🚀 Effortlessly scrape emails from Instagram specific profile from search engine based on your keyword as Excel/CSV/JSON/HTML/XML file.

🔧 How it Works:
1️⃣ Click extension icon.
2️⃣ Input keyword and email, then click the "Start" button on extension popup.
3️⃣ Choose to download from the data scraping pop-up or the task list on extension.

✨ Included features:
1️⃣ You can scrape emails as per specified keyword, email domain without duplicate record.
2️⃣ You can export data into Excel/CSV/JSON/HTML/XML, data include Email address, Title, Description, Link url, Keyword, Email domain.
3️⃣ You can manage your history scape task data.

Note: This extension is an independent creation and is not affiliated with or endorsed by Instagram❗️🔒
